titleStmt.title: A particular declaration or testimony, of the vndutifull and traiterous affection borne against her Maiestie by Edmond Campion Iesuite, and other condemned priestes witnessed by their owne confessions: in reproofe of those slanderous bookes & libels deliuered out to the contrary by such as are malitiously affected towards her Maiestie and the state. Published by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Campion, Edmund, Saint, 1540-1581.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
